title: Customer Complaint About Salesperson
description: A customer calls to complain that they felt pressured and misled by a salesperson during their visit.

tasks.description: Listen to the customer's full complaint without interruption and express empathy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent allows the customer to voice their concerns fully.

tasks.description: Gather details about the incident, including the date of the visit and the salesperson's name.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all relevant details of the incident.

tasks.description: Apologize on behalf of the dealership, log the complaint, and assure the customer that the sales manager will investigate and contact them directly.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully de-escalates the situation and creates a formal complaint ticket for the manager.
